## Teaching Resources

This section provides supplementary materials to support teaching and learning of co-ordinate geometry.

### Available Resources

- [Worksheets](worksheets.qmd): Printable practice exercises
- [Worked Examples](examples.qmd): Step-by-step solutions to common problems

## Quick Links

### Online Tools

- [Desmos Graphing Calculator](https://www.desmos.com/calculator): Free online graphing tool
- [GeoGebra](https://www.geogebra.org/): Interactive geometry software

### Additional Reading

Students seeking extra practice or alternative explanations may benefit from:
- Khan Academy: Coordinate Plane sections
- Mathisfun: Coordinate Geometry pages

## Downloadable Materials

All worksheets and resources are provided in formats suitable for printing and classroom use.

## Contributing

If you have additional resources or improvements, please consider contributing to this project via GitHub.
